snippet: During the Super Bowl, Lynch, a Seattle Seahawks running back, posted a photo on his Twitter account that was a subtle but clear message that he had chosen to retire at age 29....
lead_paragraph: During the Super Bowl, Lynch, a Seattle Seahawks running back, posted a photo on his Twitter account that was a subtle but clear message that he had chosen to retire at age 29.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks running back Marshawn Lynch's tweet announcing his retirement from football has been retweeted almost 200,000 times as fans and teammates pay tribute to his impressive career.

headline.main: Marshawn Lynch Signals He’s Leaving, but He’s Likely to Linger in Fans’ Minds
headline.print_headline: Lynch Signals That He Is Walking Away, but He Is Likely to Linger in Fans’ Minds
